channel.title: Help! please read very urgent
channel.description:
Hello everyone, thanks for clicking on this topic. It's not as urgent as you may think but please read on.
Now I wanted to know how to change the color of your username. Example: Say I wanted a donator's name in red. In the chat box i want it to look like: *donor sign here*Donator's Name: Hey!
Can anyone help me please?

item.title: Help! please read very urgent
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Erm thanks but I didn’t ask for that :S sorry?

I wanted to know how to change the color of the player’s username in the chat box.

Thanks though.

Read full topic

item.title: Help! please read very urgent
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && !muted) { String text = command.substring(5); if ((donator == 1) && (playerRights <= 0)) { yell("[Donator] " + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 0) { yell("[Player]" + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 1) { yell("[Mod] " + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 2) { yell("[Admin] " + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3) { yell("[Owner] " + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 4) { yell("[Player] " + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

Read full topic
